channel.title: Insurance, angels and entrepreneurship
channel.description:
Continuing the discussion from [Remove any image click / link / lightbox from gallery page](http://talk.cregox.com/t/remove-any-image-click-link-lightbox-from-gallery-page/7513/10):
[quote="chadnitschke, post:10, topic:7513, full:true"] Let me know if I there is anything I can do to return the favor [/quote]
Since you asked, you [work with insurance][1], don't you? Or is it only with angel investment? Both topics I find fascinating and interest me a lot. I know almost nothing about insurance in the US, and just a little bit about angels but, as [an entrepreneur myself][2] I probably could use both.
How could we talk more about either?
[1]: http://www.insure.vc/ [2]: http://talk.cregox.com/t/the-making-of-your-home/7491?u=cawas

item.title: Insurance, angels and entrepreneurship
item.dc:creator: @chadnitschke Chad Nitschke
item.description:
@chadnitschke wrote:

Insurance...fascinating? I don't hear that a lot, but happy to assist! I'll email you privately -

US: +1 (415) 662.8586 (Please note, this number has recently changed) Ireland: +353 (83) 480.1680

Read full topic
